_sText:
----------------------
CREDITS
----------------------
Ok first off i did not make the original of this map so i cannot take full credit for it. Info on the maps makers is in the hall of fame inside the map.

I did make v2, v2_1, v3 and v4

----------------------
NEW STUFF
----------------------
1. New ramps that lead to new places on the map
2. Lasers in jail activated by a code
3. Light environment just to make things look better
4. Optimization of the map
5. More spawn points
6. Cure for the spawn killing
7. New way for dealing out the weapons

And a few more bits that ive probly forgoten

----------------------
